description: Styles for a Tic Tac Toe game's frontend, including theme management with CSS variables, layout styling, and various responsive design aspects.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class for the Tic Tac Toe game, setting overall layout and theme.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Container for the game with proper padding and width settings.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Grid layout for the Tic Tac Toe game board.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styling for individual squares in the game board.

classes.name: control-button
classes.description: Styling for control buttons within the game.

classes.name: restart-button
classes.description: Styling for the button to restart the game.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button to toggle between light and dark themes.
